Class PluginUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.util.PluginUtil

  • public final class PluginUtil
extends Object
    Util functions for every plugin in this library.

    • Method Detail

      • convertMapToList

        public static List<String[]> convertMapToList(Map<String,String> map)
        Converts a Map to a list where the entry of the list contains an array with the key and the value.
        Parameters:
        map - The map that will be converted.
        Returns:
        A list of String arrays where the first element of the array is the key and the second is the value.

      • createArtifactMap

        public static Map<ArtifactKey,ArtifactType> createArtifactMap(DistributionPackageType distributionPackage)
        Creates the artifact map for the distribution package.
        Parameters:
        distributionPackage - The distribution package.
        Returns:
        The artifact map.

      • deleteFolderRecurse

        public static void deleteFolderRecurse(File folder)
        Deletes a folder with its content from the computer.
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder that should be deleted.

      • getArtifactsToRemove

        public static List<ArtifactType> getArtifactsToRemove(Map<ArtifactKey,ArtifactType> currentArtifactMap,
                                      DistributionPackageType newDistributionPackage)
        Calculates the artifacts that should be deleted after an upgrade.
        Parameters:
        currentArtifactMap - The artifact map that is currently installed.
        newDistributionPackage - The new distribution package that will be installed.
        Returns:
        The artifact list that should be deleted.

      • getOS

        public static String getOS()
        Returns the OS type.
        Returns:
        The operating system type.

      • isBufferSame

        public static boolean isBufferSame(byte[] original,
                   int originalLength,
                   byte[] target)
        Checks whether the content of the two buffers are the same.
        Parameters:
        original - The original buffer.
        originalLength - The length of the original buffer that should be checked.
        target - The target buffer that should be the same.
        Returns:
        Whether the two buffers are the same or not.

      • normalizeVersion

        public static String normalizeVersion(String version)
        Getting the normalized version of an artifact. The artifact has to have at least three digits inside the version separated by dots. If there are less than two dots inside the version it is extended with the necessary numbers of ".0".
        Parameters:
        version - The version that is checked.
        Returns:
        A normalizad version.

      • sendCommandToSocket

        public static String sendCommandToSocket(String command,
                         Socket socket,
                         String serverName,
                         org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log)
                                  throws IOException
        Sends a command to a socket and returns a response. This function works based on line breaks.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to send.
        socket - The socket to send the command to.
        serverName - The name of the server.
        log - The logger where debug information will be written.
        Returns:
        The response from the server.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem in the connection.
